item.title: Steve add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "Eighty percent of success is showing up." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Steve add a quote by Samuel Johnson
item.description: "I would rather see the portrait of a dog that I know, than all the allegorical paintings they can show me in the world." -- Samuel Johnson

item.title: Steve add a quote by Anton Checkov
item.description: "Man has been endowed with reason, with the power to create, so that he can add to what he's been given." -- Anton Checkov

item.title: Steve add a quote by Neil Peart
item.description: "From first to last, the peak is never passed. Something always fires the light that gets in your eyes." -- Neil Peart

item.title: Steve add a quote by Logan Pearsall Smith
item.description: "People say that life is the thing, but I prefer reading." -- Logan Pearsall Smith

item.title: Steve add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Nine requisites for contented living: Health enough to make work a pleasure. Wealth enough to support your needs. Strength to battle with difficulties and overcome them. Grace enough to confess your sins and forsake them. Patience enough to toil until some good is accomplished. Charity enough to see some good in your neighbor. Love enough to move you to be useful and helpful to others. Faith enough to make real the things of God. Hope enough to remove all anxious fears concerning the future." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
